title: The Writer's Almanac for Saturday, April 16, 2022
description: The originator of “The Boxcar Children,” author Gertrude Chandler Warner was born on this day in 1890. She wrote the first 18 of the series.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: The originator of “The Boxcar Children,” author Gertrude Chandler Warner was born on this day in 1890. She wrote the first 18 of the series.
